雭字的基本解释

雭
sè
小雨声：“修修复雭雭，黄叶此时飞。”

雭
xí
古同“霫”。

雭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sè］
［《廣韻》色立切，入緝，生。］
象声词。雨声。

雭字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【雨字部】　雭； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1371第35
【廣韻】色立切【集韻】色入切，?音歰。【玉篇】雭雭，雨聲。【廣韻】小雨聲也。　又【集韻】息入切，音靸。同霫。

雭字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
雭字的起名意思

小雨声。

雭
Basic explanation of words
雭
sè
The light rain sounded: "Repair the miracle, and the yellow leaves fly now."
雭
xí
The ancient same "pi".
雭
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sè]
["Guangyun" is a sharp cut, seized, and born. ]
Onomatopoeia. The sound of rain.
雭
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Rain Characters】　雭; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1371 35
[Guang Yun] Se Liqie [Ji Yun] Se Liqie, sound and sound. [Jade articles] 雭雭, the sound of rain. [Guang Yun] The sound of light rain.　[Jiyun] Breathing and cutting, the sound is 靸. Same as 霫.
